{"addons": [{"id": "57gi1y", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "blog", "parameters": "{}", "display_name": "Developer Newsletters \\\\u{1f4f0}"}, {"id": "sjhpwx", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "wiki", "parameters": "{\\\\\\\"title\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"Contribute to NEAR Dev NEWS \\\\u{1f91d}\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"subtitle\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"content\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nNEAR Dev NEWS is our developer newsletter dedicated to sharing insights, updates, and resources within the NEAR Protocol developer community. There are numerous ways you can contribute to NEAR Dev NEWS and help shape weekly updates.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n1. **Articles and Tutorials**: Share your expertise and knowledge by writing articles and tutorials related to NEAR Protocol development.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n2. **Project Showcases**: Showcase your projects and applications built on the NEAR Protocol.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n3. **Event Announcements and Reports**: Keep the community informed about upcoming NEAR-related events, workshops, hackathons, and conferences. Additionally, share your experiences and key takeaways from events you\\\\\\'ve attended.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n4. **Feedback and Suggestions**: Your feedback is invaluable in shaping the direction and content of NEAR Dev NEWS. Share your thoughts on the newsletter\\\\\\'s content, format, and topics. Additionally, suggest ideas for future editions, highlight areas for improvement, and provide constructive criticism to help us better serve the community.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n5. **Sharing and Promotion**: Spread the word about NEAR Dev NEWS within your networks and communities. Share articles, tutorials, and updates on social media platforms, developer forums, and blockchain-related communities.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n  \\\\\\\\n ##### Submit all relevant links via our \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"Discussions page\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\" and get featured! \\\\\\\\n **Be sure to include a brief bio and any resources.**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"textAlign\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"left\\\\\\\"}", "display_name": "How to get featured \\\\u{2728}"}], "handle": "neardevnews"}

{"addons": [{"id": "57gi1y", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "blog", "parameters": "{}", "display_name": "Developer Newsletters \\\\u{1f4f0}"}, {"id": "sjhpwx", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "wiki", "parameters": "{\\\\\\\"title\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"Contribute to NEAR Dev NEWS \\\\u{1f91d}\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"subtitle\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"content\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nNEAR Dev NEWS is our developer newsletter dedicated to sharing insights, updates, and resources within the NEAR Protocol developer community. There are numerous ways you can contribute to NEAR Dev NEWS and help shape weekly updates.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n1. **Articles and Tutorials**: Share your expertise and knowledge by writing articles and tutorials related to NEAR Protocol development.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n2. **Project Showcases**: Showcase your projects and applications built on the NEAR Protocol.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n3. **Event Announcements and Reports**: Keep the community informed about upcoming NEAR-related events, workshops, hackathons, and conferences. Additionally, share your experiences and key takeaways from events you\\\\\\'ve attended.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n4. **Feedback and Suggestions**: Your feedback is invaluable in shaping the direction and content of NEAR Dev NEWS. Share your thoughts on the newsletter\\\\\\'s content, format, and topics. Additionally, suggest ideas for future editions, highlight areas for improvement, and provide constructive criticism to help us better serve the community.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n5. **Sharing and Promotion**: Spread the word about NEAR Dev NEWS within your networks and communities. Share articles, tutorials, and updates on social media platforms, developer forums, and blockchain-related communities.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n  \\\\\\\\n ##### Submit all relevant links via our \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"Discussions page\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\" and get featured! \\\\\\\\n **Be sure to include a brief bio and any resources.**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"textAlign\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"left\\\\\\\"}", "display_name": "How to get featured \\\\u{2728}"}, {"id": "7om7l3", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "announcements", "parameters": "{}", "display_name": "Announcements"}], "handle": "neardevnews"}

{"addons": [{"id": "duxizk", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "wiki", "parameters": "{\\\\\\\"title\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"Overview\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"subtitle\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"content\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"#### COMMUNITY\\\\\\\\n- 47 members\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n#### NEPS\\\\\\\\n- NEP-418 Proposal to allow attached_deposit in view contexts - [LINK](https://github.com/near/NEPs/pull/418)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n## STRUCTURE\\\\\\\\nThe Tooling community consists of two main groups:\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n### Working Group\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nThis formal group is a selected committee of subject matter experts who make official decisions on proposals and questions related to the NEAR dApp standards. They follow a strict process to review proposals, recommend funding to DAO or grant programs, and hold grant takers accountable. They engage with the broader community to understand their needs and encourage ideation.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Members**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n- [Bo Yao](https://github.com/ailisp)\\\\\\\\n- [David Millar-Durrant](https://github.com/DavidM-D)\\\\\\\\n- [Serhii Volovyk](https://github.com/volovyks)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n### Community Group\\\\\\\\nThis informal self-organized group provides a space for anyone interested in the NEAR tooling. While this group does not make official decisions, it offers a great opportunity to meet with others to share ideas and submit proposals. This group is not controlled by anyone but the people who are organizing it. The group has a dedicated Telegram channel.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n#### Communication Channels\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n- [Tooling Community Group in Telegram](https://t.me/NEAR_Tools_Community_Group)\\\\\\\\n- Here on the Discussions page!\\\\\\\\n- Check the Events tab for upcoming Community/Work Group calls.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nIf you\\\\u{2019}d like to add links to your project, interesting reference material for the community, or anything else worth linking here, please reach out to the community lead! We want to be as inclusive as possible.\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"textAlign\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"left\\\\\\\"}", "display_name": "About us \\\\u{2b50}\\\\u{fe0f}"}, {"id": "kp910a", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "wiki", "parameters": "{\\\\\\\"title\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"Tooling Community / WG Calls\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"subtitle\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"content\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"**Welcome to the Tooling Community and Work Group Calls page, where you can find recaps and information on previous community and work group calls related to NEAR DevHub and tooling development.**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n### [Community Call] #2: Jan 30th, 2024\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**MODERATOR :** Lyudmil\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**VIDEO :** [Tools Community Call #2 \\\\u{2013} NEAR DevHub January 30th, 2024](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I-u5WDLfWWU)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**AGENDA**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n- LavaNetwork presents their solution that aims to help scale the RPC services demand - https://lava-etwork.xyz\\\\\\\\n- Vlad presents Cargo Near Template - https://github.com/near/cargo-near-ne...\\\\\\\\n- near-sdk-rs 5.0 soon to be released with ABI enabled by default.\\\\\\\\n- Noah shares heads-up on the simplified dev-container he is currently working on.\\\\\\\\n- NearBlocks is soon to release a version of the explorer on BOS - https://beta.nearblocks.io\\\\\\\\n- Andrey Talks about SourceScan - NEAR-native smart contract verifier https://near.org/sourcescan.near/widg...\\\\\\\\n- Didier presents the new version of the data analytics solution PikesPeak - https://pikespeak.ai/ \\\\\\\\n- Jutsu adds IntelliSense, Live Collaboration, Copilot about to land. - https://jutsu.ai\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n----------\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n### [Community Call] #1: Oct 6th, 2023\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**MODERATOR :** Maxwell S\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**VIDEO :** [Tools Community Group Call #1 \\\\u{2013} NEAR DevHub October 6th, 2023](https://youtu.be/vg9LYGLU7ok)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**AGENDA**\\\\\\\\n-  SourceScan presents the product and upcoming work\\\\\\\\n- Michael (Pagoda) presents bos-loader and workflow\\\\\\\\n- Guillermo presents BOS VSCode extension\\\\\\\\n- Elliot (DevHub) presents some of his toolchain/workflow for building BOS apps\\\\\\\\n  \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n----------\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n### [Working Group Call] - January 19, 2023\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**MODERATOR :** Vlad Frolov\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**VIDEO :** [Tooling Working Group Call - January 19, 2023](https://youtu.be/poVmblmc3L4)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**AGENDA**\\\\\\\\n-   Update on Developer Governance and the NEP process\\\\\\\\n-   Introductions\\\\\\\\n-   Discussion: NEP-418 Proposal to allow attached_deposit in view contexts\\\\\\\\n-   Voting Decision\\\\\\\\n-   Getting Involved\\\\\\\\n  \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**NOTES**\\\\\\\\n \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**- NEP-418 :** A proposal to implement an `attached_deposit` host function for view-function calls, so it would just return zero instead of aborting the function call. \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**VOTE DECISION**\\\\\\\\n-   NEP-418 : Approved\\\\\\\\n    \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**ACTION ITEMS**\\\\\\\\n- No action items were discussed\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**RELATED RESOURCES**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n- NEP-418 Proposal to allow attached_deposit in view contexts - [LINK](https://github.com/near/NEPs/pull/418)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n[Previous Meeting Notes](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1DGMpaS_X1MSoRae5R0ULClc5Dsv6KmWvfjicFZTJZ64)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n---------\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n  \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"textAlign\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"left\\\\\\\"}", "display_name": "Community Calls / Events \\\\u{1f4fa}"}, {"id": "kiz6zp", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "blog", "parameters": "{}", "display_name": "Blog"}], "handle": "tooling"}

{"data": {"tooling.community.devhub.near": {"profile": {"name": "Tooling", "tags": {"tooling": "", "community": "", "announcements": ""}, "image": {"url": "https://ipfs.near.social/ipfs/bafkreie25uquonqegy2zq3mw22lxavscptdfx2awd5j5quzier62owceuu"}, "linktree": {"github": "near", "twitter": "NEARDevHub", "website": "near.social/devhub.near/widget/app?page=community&handle=tooling", "telegram": "NEAR_Tools_Community_Group"}, "description": "This space brings together individuals, experts, and organizations who are interested in supporting the ongoing innovation of tooling on NEAR.\\\\n\\\\nLearn more about our community [on DevHub](/devhub.near/widget/app?page=community&handle=tooling).", "backgroundImage": {"url": "https://ipfs.near.social/ipfs/bafkreidvb4ge7ruznpfeqfwmjgjuuuw3lwidkyc5yz64r6vis7kvvjoram"}}}, "discussions.tooling.community.devhub.near": {"profile": {"name": "Tooling (Community Discussions)", "tags": {"tooling": "", "community": "", "discussions": ""}, "image": {"url": "https://ipfs.near.social/ipfs/bafkreie25uquonqegy2zq3mw22lxavscptdfx2awd5j5quzier62owceuu"}, "linktree": {"github": "near", "twitter": "NEARDevHub", "website": "near.social/devhub.near/widget/app?page=community&handle=tooling", "telegram": "NEAR_Tools_Community_Group"}, "description": "Supporting the ongoing innovation of developers tooling.\\\\n\\\\nLearn more about our community [on DevHub](/devhub.near/widget/app?page=community&handle=tooling).", "backgroundImage": {"url": "https://ipfs.near.social/ipfs/bafkreidvb4ge7ruznpfeqfwmjgjuuuw3lwidkyc5yz64r6vis7kvvjoram"}}}}}

[LINK](https://github.com/near/NEPs/pull/418)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n[Previous Meeting Notes](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1DGMpaS_X1MSoRae5R0ULClc5Dsv6KmWvfjicFZTJZ64)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n---------\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n  \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"textAlign\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"left\\\\\\\"}", "display_name": "Community Calls / Events \\\\u{1f4fa}"}], "handle": "tooling"}

{"addons": [{"id": "duxizk", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "wiki", "parameters": "{\\\\\\\"title\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"Overview\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"subtitle\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"content\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"#### COMMUNITY\\\\\\\\n- 47 members\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n#### NEPS\\\\\\\\n- NEP-418 Proposal to allow attached_deposit in view contexts - [LINK](https://github.com/near/NEPs/pull/418)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n## STRUCTURE\\\\\\\\nThe Tooling community consists of two main groups:\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n### Working Group\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nThis formal group is a selected committee of subject matter experts who make official decisions on proposals and questions related to the NEAR dApp standards. They follow a strict process to review proposals, recommend funding to DAO or grant programs, and hold grant takers accountable. They engage with the broader community to understand their needs and encourage ideation.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Members**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n- [Bo Yao](https://github.com/ailisp)\\\\\\\\n- [David Millar-Durrant](https://github.com/DavidM-D)\\\\\\\\n- [Serhii Volovyk](https://github.com/volovyks)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n### Community Group\\\\\\\\nThis informal self-organized group provides a space for anyone interested in the NEAR tooling. While this group does not make official decisions, it offers a great opportunity to meet with others to share ideas and submit proposals. This group is not controlled by anyone but the people who are organizing it. The group has a dedicated Telegram channel.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n#### Communication Channels\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n- [Tooling Community Group in Telegram](https://t.me/NEAR_Tools_Community_Group)\\\\\\\\n- Here on the Discussions page!\\\\\\\\n- Check the Events tab for upcoming Community/Work Group calls.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nIf you\\\\u{2019}d like to add links to your project, interesting reference material for the community, or anything else worth linking here, please reach out to the community lead! We want to be as inclusive as possible.\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"textAlign\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"left\\\\\\\"}", "display_name": "About us"}, {"id": "kp910a", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "wiki", "parameters": "{\\\\\\\"title\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"Tooling Community / WG Calls\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"subtitle\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"content\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"**Welcome to the Tooling Community and Work Group Calls page, where you can find recaps and information on previous community and work group calls related to NEAR DevHub and tooling development.**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n### [Community Call] #2: Jan 30th, 2024\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**MODERATOR :** Lyudmil\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**VIDEO :** [Tools Community Call #2 \\\\u{2013} NEAR DevHub January 30th, 2024](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I-u5WDLfWWU)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**AGENDA**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n- LavaNetwork presents their solution that aims to help scale the RPC services demand - https://lava-etwork.xyz\\\\\\\\n- Vlad presents Cargo Near Template - https://github.com/near/cargo-near-ne...\\\\\\\\n- near-sdk-rs 5.0 soon to be released with ABI enabled by default.\\\\\\\\n- Noah shares heads-up on the simplified dev-container he is currently working on.\\\\\\\\n- NearBlocks is soon to release a version of the explorer on BOS - https://beta.nearblocks.io\\\\\\\\n- Andrey Talks about SourceScan - NEAR-native smart contract verifier https://near.org/sourcescan.near/widg...\\\\\\\\n- Didier presents the new version of the data analytics solution PikesPeak - https://pikespeak.ai/ \\\\\\\\n- Jutsu adds IntelliSense, Live Collaboration, Copilot about to land. - https://jutsu.ai\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n----------\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n### [Community Call] #1: Oct 6th, 2023\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**MODERATOR :** Maxwell S\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**VIDEO :** [Tools Community Group Call #1 \\\\u{2013} NEAR DevHub October 6th, 2023](https://youtu.be/vg9LYGLU7ok)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**AGENDA**\\\\\\\\n-  SourceScan presents the product and upcoming work\\\\\\\\n- Michael (Pagoda) presents bos-loader and workflow\\\\\\\\n- Guillermo presents BOS VSCode extension\\\\\\\\n- Elliot (DevHub) presents some of his toolchain/workflow for building BOS apps\\\\\\\\n  \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n----------\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n### [Working Group Call] - January 19, 2023\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**MODERATOR :** Vlad Frolov\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**VIDEO :** [Tooling Working Group Call - January 19, 2023](https://youtu.be/poVmblmc3L4)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**AGENDA**\\\\\\\\n-   Update on Developer Governance and the NEP process\\\\\\\\n-   Introductions\\\\\\\\n-   Discussion: NEP-418 Proposal to allow attached_deposit in view contexts\\\\\\\\n-   Voting Decision\\\\\\\\n-   Getting Involved\\\\\\\\n  \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**NOTES**\\\\\\\\n \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**- NEP-418 :** A proposal to implement an `attached_deposit` host function for view-function calls, so it would just return zero instead of aborting the function call. \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**VOTE DECISION**\\\\\\\\n-   NEP-418 : Approved\\\\\\\\n    \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**ACTION ITEMS**\\\\\\\\n- No action items were discussed\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**RELATED RESOURCES**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n- NEP-418 Proposal to allow attached_deposit in view contexts - [LINK](https://github.com/near/NEPs/pull/418)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n[Previous Meeting Notes](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1DGMpaS_X1MSoRae5R0ULClc5Dsv6KmWvfjicFZTJZ64)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n---------\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n  \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"textAlign\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"left\\\\\\\"}", "display_name": "Community Calls"}], "handle": "tooling"}

{"handle": "tooling", "community_addon": {"id": "kp910a", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "wiki", "parameters": "{\\\\\\\"title\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"Tools Community Calls\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"subtitle\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"Welcome to the Tooling Community and Work Group Calls page, where you can find recaps and information on previous community and work group calls related to NEAR DevHub and tooling development.\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"content\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"\\\\\\\\n \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n##### Here are the recaps of our previous calls:\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n### **[Community Call] #5: Apr 9, 2024**\\\\\\\\n[![Tools Community Call #5](https://ipfs.near.social/ipfs/bafkreigo3mpikbg2ogjipjonelfbvnrtypx6hkyr3rszaicyi3pgxhwyou)](https://youtube.com)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Watch on YouTube: [Tools Community Call #2 \\\\u{2013} NEAR DevHub January 30th, 2024](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I-u5WDLfWWU)**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Recap:**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n- LavaNetwork presents their solution that aims to help scale the RPC services demand https://lava-etwork.xyz\\\\\\\\n- Vlad presents Cargo Near Template https://github.com/near/cargo-near-ne...\\\\\\\\n- near-sdk-rs 5.0 soon to be released with ABI enabled by default.\\\\\\\\n- Noah shares heads-up on the simplified dev-container he is currently working on.\\\\\\\\n- NearBlocks is soon to release a version of the explorer on BOS - https://beta.nearblocks.io\\\\\\\\n- Andrey Talks about SourceScan - NEAR-native smart contract verifier https://near.org/sourcescan.near/widg...\\\\\\\\n- Didier presents the new version of the data analytics solution PikesPeak - https://pikespeak.ai/ \\\\\\\\n- Jutsu adds IntelliSense, Live Collaboration, Copilot about to land. - https://jutsu.ai\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n----------\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n### **[Community Call] #4: Wed Mar 6, 2024**\\\\\\\\n[![Tools Community Call #4](https://i.imgur.com/eR30Vrg.jpeg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Rd3Vn09c-Goi)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Watch on YouTube: [Tools Community Group Call #5 \\\\u{2013} NEAR DevHub October 6th, 2023](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kcKigCtsHDo)**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Recap:**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n----------\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n### **[Community Call] #3: Feb 21, 2024**\\\\\\\\n[![Tools Community Call #3](https://i.imgur.com/UdPKO4F.jpeg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kcKigCtsHDo)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Watch on YouTube [Tools Community Group Call #3 \\\\u{2013} NEAR DevHub October 6th, 2023](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kcKigCtsHDo)**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Recap:**\\\\\\\\n- SourceScan presents the product and upcoming work\\\\\\\\n- Michael (Pagoda) presents bos-loader and workflow\\\\\\\\n- Guillermo presents BOS VSCode extension\\\\\\\\n- Elliot (DevHub) presents some of his toolchain/workflow for building BOS apps\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n----------\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**All sessions can be found on the [DevHub YouTube Channel](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vg9LYGLU7ok&list=PLrLLmjcJVAB9RoK95udIqkVE_JqHt_CCd)**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n---------\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n  \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"textAlign\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"left\\\\\\\"}", "display_name": "Community Calls"}}
